personal_info.name: Farshid Pourlatifi
personal_info.title: Senior Full Stack Developer | AI Integration Specialist

professional_summary: Senior Full Stack Developer with 15+ years building scalable web applications and architecting AI-powered SaaS solutions. Expert in React, Vue.js, FastAPI, and AI integration technologies (Vocode, Dify, ElevenLabs). Proven track record improving application performance by 30% through AI voice agent optimization and modern architecture implementation. Specialized in transforming legacy systems into high-performance platforms while leading technical architecture decisions for international teams.

achievements: Rearchitected LetzTalk SaaS platform using React/Redux architecture and AI integration (ElevenLabs, Dify, Vocode), supporting 6 active tenants with 8 deployments in progress
Implemented Satellite architecture for Master/Tenant system enabling white-label solutions for enterprise customers, reducing client onboarding time by 60%
Enhanced AI Voice Agent functionality with optimizations achieving 30% performance improvement and significantly reducing response latency
Developed custom WordPress plugins integrated with AI workflows, streamlining content management for multiple tenants
Established automated testing pipeline using Vitest and Playwright, improving code quality and deployment confidence
Collaborated with cross-functional teams across multiple time zones to deliver features on aggressive timelines
Led zero-downtime migrations of 5+ e-commerce platforms from Magento 1 to Magento 2 and BigCommerce, maintaining 100% data integrity and all third-party integrations
Architected scalable SaaS product using Vue.js 3, Tailwind UI, and HapiJS backend, implementing modern component-based architecture and RESTful Application Programming Interfaces (APIs)
Optimized e-commerce performance across Magento 2, Shopify, and BigCommerce platforms, reducing page load times by 40% through code splitting and caching strategies
Implemented secure authentication and authorization systems using JSON Web Tokens (JWT) and OAuth 2.0
Developed automated deployment pipelines using Jenkins, reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
Integrated RabbitMQ message queuing for asynchronous processing, improving system scalability
Redesigned 5 corporate WordPress websites with custom design system, increasing user time on site by 30% and returning visitors by 20%
Collaborated with design team to establish unique brand identity across all digital properties
Developed reusable component library using SASS, reducing development time for new pages by 50%
Implemented automated build processes using Grunt and Jenkins pipelines, streamlining deployment workflow
Optimized website performance achieving 90+ Google PageSpeed scores across all sites
Developed user interface and user experience (UI/UX) for "Quantreex" automated stock trading platform serving 1000+ active users
Implemented Web Worker solution for high-performance data processing, enabling real-time handling of 10,000+ trading position records with client-side search and sorting
Built static site generation workflow using Hugo and JavaServer Pages (JSP) for blog and marketing content
Created Node.js-based Application Programming Interface (API) for automated screenshot generation using headless Chrome
Developed RequireJS/Grunt build workflow with source code encryption for production deployments
Integrated third-party vanilla JavaScript components into BackboneJS application architecture
Developed UI/UX for "Hayoola" games marketplace (hayoola.com) and "RobotCache" US-based game store using Mithril.js framework
Leveraged Mithril.js performance benefits (3x faster than React, 12x lighter) for optimal user experience
Integrated WordPress and Hugo static site generator with e-commerce platform
Implemented BackboneJS/RequireJS architecture for single-page application (SPA) functionality
Implemented Elasticsearch for classified advertisements system, enabling sub-second search across 100,000+ vehicle listings
Developed analytics data gathering tool using C# Web API and Elasticsearch for business intelligence
Built Backbone.js single-page applications for lead generation and sales processes
Implemented automated deployment pipeline as part of continuous delivery system
Maintained ASP.NET Model-View-Controller (MVC) applications with business logic implementation
Configured Google Analytics page tracking and event tracking for marketing insights
Managed website monitoring using New Relic and coordinated server migrations with zero downtime
Configured Redis Sentinel-based failover cluster for highly available web application infrastructure
Implemented OAuth 2.0 specification for authentication and authorization across classified advertisements platform
Deployed Elasticsearch search engine for full-text search and filtering capabilities
Developed Backbone.js solutions for modular single-page application components
Created LESS-based styling workflow for consistent Bootstrap user interface across web properties
Integrated Microsoft Azure cloud services for scalable application hosting
Managed team of 5 developers as portal solutions team lead
Developed portal strategy based on Drupal content management system (CMS)
Integrated Drupal with company back-office systems, adopted by 80% of existing customers
Configured Apache Solr for advanced search functionality across portal content
Implemented caching strategies using Varnish and Memcached, reducing server load by 70%
Administered Linux servers running Apache/Nginx web servers
